learn:
Add/edit your account settings here.

Put your homepage in the URL section.

You can also delete your account and find your API key below

copy.delete_warning: Deleting your account is permanent. There is no undo. It's also kind of sad. Be very sure you want to do it.
copy.enter_password: Please enter your current password to make changes:
copy.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this? It will be permanently erased.
